p: Generation of sequences and multiple sequences alignment. The forward and reverse chromatograms were assembled in Lasergene 8.00 software suite (DNASTAR Inc., USA). For multiple sequence alignment, complete E gene sequences of DENV that are reported from different geographic locations were downloaded from the GenBank database ( S3 File) and the consensus sequences were aligned using MAFFT version 7 [ 21â€“ 23].
